---
title: "R Notebook"
output: html_notebook
---


installing necessary packages
```{r, eval=FALSE}
install.packages("boxr")
install.packages("tidyverse")
install.packages("data.table")
install.packages("glue")
```

take a look at the $PATH
```{bash, engine.opts='-l'}
echo $PATH
```

Download plink 1.9 (will have plink in the container later)
```{bash}
mkdir -p ~/.local/bin/
curl -o ~/.local/bin/plink.zip https://s3.amazonaws.com/plink1-assets/plink_linux_x86_64_20230116.zip
cd ~/.local/bin/
unzip plink.zip
```
